comment: Fixed a lot of spelling and grammar mistakes.
Improved version list with red/green colours.
Moved Grey Hulk and Hero Juggernaut from Season 2 to Off-Season. They will need to be re-added to your collection again!
Added Grey Hulk and Hero Juggernaut, but not included as default.
Beta versions, very close to the final version.
Aplha versions, everything is work in progress!
